body:
Heey resepignev here,
Kylocode announced if the Avicus Facebook page get 50 likes, 100 likes and so on.
He will release Omega Update sneakpeaks!
So if you have a Facebook account (or more than one) like the Avicus Facebook page!
Maybe he'll announce the update date/time if we get enough likes. (Unconfirmed)

The Facebook page of Avicus: https://www.facebook.com/AvicusNetwork

Go and like it!

Status:

Likes: 100
Likes until next Sneakpeak: 0 (50)
Omega Update Date: In less than one month [Unconfirmed] 

Sneakpeaks:

First Sneakpeak: Released! Look at the facebook page!
Second Sneakpeak: Released! Look at the facebook page!
Third Sneakpeak: Still waiting...
Fourth Sneakpeak: [None yet]

Tweak(sneak)peaks:

First Tweakpeak: http://i.imgur.com/iAWP5i3.png
Second Tweakpeak: http://i.imgur.com/u2LYspN.png
Third Tweakpeak: http://i.imgur.com/55gEarN.png
Fourth Tweakpeak: http://i.imgur.com/SOVcpco.jpg
Fifth Tweakpeak: http://i.imgur.com/NM6NAeN.png
Sixth Tweakpeak: http://i.imgur.com/D2HcaEk.jpg
Seventh Teakpeak: [None yet]
